title: Data-Driven Marketing That Delivers Results
description: With nearly 20 years of experience at BCG, McKinsey, and leading B2B companies, I bring a unique approach that combines strategic thinking with tactical execution. My methodology is built around three pillars:

pillars.title: Strategic Targeting
pillars.description: Identifying your ideal customer profile and building precision-targeted campaigns that reach decision-makers at the right time.

pillars.title: Messaging Optimization
pillars.description: Crafting resonant value propositions and messaging frameworks that cut through noise and connect with your audience's pain points.

pillars.title: Performance Analytics
pillars.description: Implementing advanced analytics and attribution models to continuously improve ROI and optimize channel performance.
